title: Optofluidic Distributed Feedback Dye Laser
abstract: We demonstrated an optofluidic distributed feedback (DFB) dye laser on a poly(dimethylsiloxane) (PDMS) chip. Single-mode operation was obtained with 0.21nm linewidth. We achieved nearly 60nm continuously tunable output by mechanically varying the grating period.
